short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with the unique and captivating Billie Eilish Theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by the Grammy-winning artist, this theme brings the bold, creative, and artistic vibe of Billie Eilish to every new tab. Whether you're a fan of her music or simply love her iconic aesthetic, this theme will turn your browser into a work of art while offering a range of practical features designed to boost your productivity.

The shortcuts feature is designed to make your browsing faster and more efficient. Quickly access your most visited websites with just a click, whether it's social media, music platforms, or other favorite sites. With everything just a click away, you'll be able to navigate the web seamlessly without losing a moment of your time.

Keep track of your schedule with the time and date display. Right within your new tab, the time feature ensures you’re always on top of your day while enjoying Billie Eilish’s bold visuals. 

Bookmark feature makes it easy to access your favorite websites or frequently visited pages, keeping your browser organized and efficient.

Need a place to jot down your thoughts or reminders? The notes feature provides a simple way to capture ideas or make lists. Whether you're writing down a quick to-do list, your favorite lyrics, or inspiration, your notes are stored securely in your browser for easy access whenever you need them.

Enjoy a personalized experience with the theme switching option. Switch between different Billie Eilish-inspired backgrounds, from iconic album covers to stunning photography that represents her unique style. Every time you open a new tab, you get a fresh look that keeps things exciting.

Billie Eilish Theme is the perfect mix of creativity and functionality, giving fans of Billie a way to immerse themselves in her world while boosting their productivity with helpful tools. Install it today and bring Billie Eilish’s distinct style to your browsing experience!
